identified_concerns.title: Cross-System Precision Alignment
identified_concerns.description: Significant precision mismatch between LQG-PFG and Enhanced Simulation systems
identified_concerns.impact: Precision mismatch of 2400.0% may introduce systematic errors
identified_concerns.proposed_solution: Implement precision harmonization algorithm to align measurement scales

identified_concerns.title: Metamaterial Amplification Uncertainty Propagation
identified_concerns.description: Uncertainty propagation through metamaterial amplification exceeds acceptable thresholds
identified_concerns.impact: Combined uncertainty of 5.4% affects field enhancement reliability
identified_concerns.proposed_solution: Develop uncertainty minimization protocol for metamaterial amplification stages

identified_concerns.title: Digital Twin Synchronization Fidelity
identified_concerns.description: Digital twin synchronization fidelity below target with excessive latency
identified_concerns.impact: Fidelity deficit of 0.040 and latency of 15.0μs affects real-time control
identified_concerns.proposed_solution: Optimize synchronization protocol and implement predictive synchronization algorithms

identified_concerns.title: Multi-Physics Coupling Stability
identified_concerns.description: Multi-physics coupling shows instability and variance across interaction domains
identified_concerns.impact: Minimum coupling of 0.890 and variance of 0.0010 may cause integration failures
identified_concerns.proposed_solution: Implement adaptive coupling stabilization with real-time feedback control

identified_concerns.title: Cross-System Validation Consistency
identified_concerns.description: Validation scores show inconsistency between individual systems and cross-system validation
identified_concerns.impact: Validation inconsistency of 0.060 indicates integration validation gaps
identified_concerns.proposed_solution: Develop unified validation framework with consistent metrics across all systems
